CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing City Center Hotels relative to Ski Lodges?
SRP.A: City Center Hotels is {below} Ski Lodges in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Treehouse Retreats relative to Ski Lodges?
SRP.A: Treehouse Retreats is {below} Ski Lodges in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Desert Camps relative to Ski Lodges?
SRP.A: Desert Camps is {below} Ski Lodges in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average room price?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Cruise Ships}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average room price?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ski Lodges}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Treehouse Retreats's minimum Average Room Price in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Treehouse Retreats's minimum Average Room Price is in {1997}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Glamping Sites's minimum Average Room Price in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Glamping Sites's minimum Average Room Price is in {1992}.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1993, was the average total Average Room Price higher or lower than between 1993 and 1996?
NC.A: The average total average room price between 1992 and 1993 was {lower} than between 1993 and 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 1996, was the average total Average Room Price higher or lower than between 2000 and 2002?
NC.A: The average total average room price between 1994 and 1996 was {lower} than between 2000 and 2002.

NC.Q: Was the total Average Room Price in 1994 higher or lower than in 1995?
NC.A: The total average room price in 1994 was {lower} than in 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 2001, did the total Average Room Price experience a larger or smaller change than between 1994 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total average room price between 1994 and 2001 was {larger} than between 1994 and 2000.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Cruise Ships} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Treehouse Retreats and City Center Hotels first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Treehouse Retreats and City Center Hotels first exchanged leading positions in {1993}.
